sqlMap.insert: insert into Tbl_Tx_PayMent_Order (id, version, plTxTraceNo, memberNO, txTypeId, mchtNo, mchtTxTime, lastMchtTxTime, mchtTxTraceNo, lastMchtTxTraceNo, txAmount, notifyUrl, txIp, plTxTime, txStatus, voucherNo, backVoucherNo, useCoupon, couponMsg, resCouponMsg, showUrl, txBody, payerPhone, verifyCode, confirmCode, orderExpireDatetime, errorCode, errorMsg, settleBatchNo, settleStatus, settleDate, feeAmount, hasCountFee, createdDatetime, lastUpdatedDatetime, lastUpdatedBy, bgNotifyUrl, creator, deleted) values (#id#, 1, #plTxTraceNo#, #memberNO#, #txTypeId#, #mchtNo#, #mchtTxTime#, #lastMchtTxTime#, #mchtTxTraceNo#, #lastMchtTxTraceNo#, #txAmount#, #notifyUrl#, #txIp#, #plTxTime#, #txStatus#, #voucherNo#, #backVoucherNo#, #useCoupon#, #couponMsg#, #resCouponMsg#, #showUrl#, #txBody#, #payerPhone#, #verifyCode#, #confirmCode#, #orderExpireDatetime#, #errorCode#, #errorMsg#, #settleBatchNo#, #settleStatus#, #settleDate#, #feeAmount#, #hasCountFee#, #createdDatetime#, #lastUpdatedDatetime#, #lastUpdatedBy#, #bgNotifyUrl#, #creator#, #deleted#)
